details: Built a full-stack AI dev tool that documents any codebase in 1 minute using NextJS, NodeJS, and SQL that generated $7k.
Led migration of the database and server from Firebase to PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM which saved the startup $5000.
Coded leads scrapper, waitlist site, and free markdown tools, generating 100k leads & 1k+ signups in Python, and Next.js.
Built the front-end of a web3 e-commerce marketplace that allows thousands of users to purchase products using crypto.
Developed the waiting list site used for the product launch that yielded 250+ of leads.
Spearheaded the refinement of the business model, using YC guides, resulting in more than 50% better market positioning.
Developed non-anonymous payment service that won 1st place in Blockchain Hub Africa Hackathon.
Designed and developed the official personal brand website for an over 2 million followers client fan base.
Integrated full fledged e-commerce store with payments & emails, selling 100+ products using ReactJS and Firebase.
Engineered a work chat app tested at an accelerator to improve efficiency in teams by +50% by cutting decision time.
Led fellow interns in a 40-day code challenge that improved team technical proficiencies and collaboration.
